question: Which country postal department released postage stamps on Yoga Expert Mr.Bishnu Charan Ghosh?
explanation: Japanese postal department released postage stamps on Yoga Expert Mr.Bishnu Charan Ghosh and his family members, in Kolkata. The country released postage stamps on Indian Yoga experts Mr.Bishnu Charan Ghosh, his son Mr.Biswanath Ghosh, daughter Ms.Karuna Ghosh and Karuna's father in law Mr.Asutosh Ghosh.
